title: Original naive review:  Rational way to organize online orders
text:
Who needs Amazon anyway?  

Update: an idiot chat bot is not customer service. 

The app lets you ‚Äúfavorite‚Äù items you like, but it doesn‚Äôt let you block retailers you don‚Äôt want to see. In my case, Ash and Erie shows up at or near the top of the recommendations every time. Which is not much use, since Ash and Erie products are exclusively for short men, and I am 6‚Äô5‚Äù. There‚Äôs literally nothing they offer that is made to fit me, but I can‚Äôt block or down-vote them, there‚Äôs no customer service , and the chat bot is a waste of time. So now Shop has a 1-star review. ‚ÄúAI‚Äù isn‚Äôt smart. Neither is relying on it exclusively for customer support. Looking forward to the backlash from consumers as customer service gets decimated and replaced by Artificial Idiots everywhere.
